level.text: Appeals shall be from final determinations as described in ยง1311 and shall be made within fifteen (15) days of service of the final decision of the Hearing Examiner.
All appeals shall be made to the Board of Appeals and Review and shall be governed by the regulations set forth in chapter 5 of DCMR Title 1, Mayor and Executive Agencies.
A final determination of liability and the amount and the type of sanctions imposed may be appealed in cases where an answer of “Deny” was entered at the hearing.
Where an answer of “Admit with Explanation” was entered at a hearing, the scope of the appeal shall be limited to the validity and propriety of the sanctions imposed.
A non-refundable appeal of ten dollars ($10.00) shall be paid at the time of filing the appeal.
